column1: Smoque BBQ////The decor at Smoque is clean and for once I use clean as negative descriptor.  When it comes to BBQ I feel like the space should be dark
column3: and loud.  I want to see a country western band playing behind chicken wire getting pelted with Old Style bottles.  I want some old dude telling customers to go to hell when they try tell him how good the BBQ they make at home is.  I want to see a sign that says "Vegetarians Suck" (I don't think vegetarians suck
column4: but I want my pit master to think that).  Unfortunately
column5: the service at Smoque is as good as the restaurant is clean.  The staff wears branded Smoque t-shirts and they all just look too damn nice and clean!
